401.message: Server fails to identify your identity. If you believe that this is a server error, please report an issue.

403.message: You are forbidden to access some resources or make some requests. If you believe this is a server error, please report an issue.

500.message: There is some unexpected error in the server. The error is logged and we will try to fix it ASAP. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

501.message: The request method is not supported by the server and cannot be handled.

502.message: There is some unexpected error in the server. The error is logged and we will try to fix it ASAP. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

503.message: There is some unexpected error in the server. The error is logged and we will try to fix it ASAP. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

504.message: There is some unexpected error in the server. The error is logged and we will try to fix it ASAP. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
